title: Daniel Rode
text:
Resources

ShareDrop.io: Web-based P2P file sharing utility
croc: Cross-platform CLI file sharing utility
Perplexity: Conversational AI search engine that uses ChatGPT as a back-end while including references for search results

title: Guide: Turn a Sketch Into a Photo
text:
First result: 
This looks interesting, but is certainly not a tornado, and there is no farm house in sight. I clicked the Run button to generate again:

There is a house now, but no tornado. Getting the output you desire requires a combination of rerunning the generation (each time it is run, a random seed is chosen), trying different sketches, and rewording your prompt.

title: About
text: This website was created as my final project for my Environmental Data Science Applications class (ESS 523A) at Colorado State University in March of 2023. It was built using R and Quarto.
